Class RailoColdboxProvider

railo-context.Component

    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICacheProvider , IColdboxApplicationCache

    Copyright Since 2005 ColdBox Framework by Luis Majano and Ortus Solutions, Corp www.coldbox.org | www.luismajano.com | www.ortussolutions.com Author: Luis Majano Description: This CacheBox provider communicates with the built in caches in the Railo Engine for ColdBox applications.
